title: xsltproc bug causes gdk-pixbuf build to fail
body:
I'm trying to install `gdk-pixbuf`, but a bug in our `libxslt` installation causes `xsltproc` to crash. libxslt itself successfully installs and passes all unit tests, but you can see the same error in the build log.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install libxslt
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Darwin Vesuvius 18.2.0 Darwin Kernel Version 18.2.0: Mon Nov 12 20:24:46 PST 2018; root:xnu-4903.231.4~2/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
``` 

Also reproduced on Cray CNL5 (Blue Waters).

### Additional information

I see the following error message in the `libxslt` build log, and in the `gdk-pixbuf` build log when it crashes:
```
I/O error : Attempt to load network entity http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.1.2/docbookx.dtd
/Users/Adam/spack/var/spack/stage/libxslt-1.1.32-3h3g4g23xwxg5t43vp3rsz44tajrgu6u/libxslt-1.1.32/doc/xsltproc.xml:8: warning: failed to load external entity "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.1.2/docbookx.dtd"
]>
  ^
I/O error : Attempt to load network entity http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl/current/manpages/docbook.xsl
warning: failed to load external entity "http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl/current/manpages/docbook.xsl"
error
xsltParseStylesheetFile : cannot parse http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl/current/manpages/docbook.xsl
compilation error: file /Users/Adam/spack/var/spack/stage/libxslt-1.1.32-3h3g4g23xwxg5t43vp3rsz44tajrgu6u/libxslt-1.1.32/doc/xsltproc.xml line 10 element refentry
xsltParseStylesheetProcess : document is not a stylesheet
make[1]: [xsltproc.1] Error 5 (ignored)
```
I sent a message to the libxslt developers, but never heard back. Has anyone ever seen this before or know of a fix? I have a feeling that `libxml2` and/or `libxslt` should depend on `docbook-xml` and/or `docbook-xsl`, but I'm not confident these packages are being installed correctly. The Homebrew recipes are much more complicated.
